oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Levensschets van sulthan Ibrahiem, vorst van Eirakh: uit het Arabisch in het Maleisch vertaald door eenen Maleischen schriftgeleerden

Hikajat sulthan Ibrahiem, radja pada negrie Eirakh: di pindahkan fokha deri pada bahasa Arab kapada bahasa Melaijoe ; di dalam ietoe, di salin poela dengan bahasa wolanda jang tsahh oleh di terdjoemahkan
Ḥikāyat Sulṭān Ibrāhīm ibn Adham. Dutch & Malay
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Roorda van Eysinga, P. P. (Philippus Pieter) , 1796-1856
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Widener Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: en uit het Maleisch in het Nederduitsch overgebracht door Philippus Pieter Roorda van Eijsinga.
Malay title pages have hijri date 1237 [1821 or 22].

Electronic reproduction. Cambridge, Mass. : Harvard College Library Digital Imaging Group, 2009. (Open Collections Program at Harvard University. Islamic Heritage Project). Copy digitized: Widener Library: PL5139.H55 D8 1822x.
In Malay. (Arabic and Roman scripts) with Dutch translation; translated from Arabic.

oai_dc:dc.dc:title: حكايت سلطان ابراهيم بن ادهم. Dutch & Malay
حكايت سلطان ابراهيم راج قد نكري عيرق: دقندهكن فقها در قد بهاس عرب كقد بهاس ملايو ددالم اين دسالن قول دقن بهاس ولند يغ صح اوله دترجومهكن رورد فن غيسنكا
